name: Megaplay Volume 1
overview: A compilation of six games previously released as individual titles. The cassette version was released in 1988 with the floppy disk following in 1989. The original publishers were Beau Jolly, Martech, Mastertronic and Melbourne House. Eddie Kidd Jump Challenge - a single player motorbike driving simulation by David Wainwright. Galactic Patrol - a single player gallery shooter by A.G. Cartlidge. Geoff Capes Strongman - a single player multi event sports simulation by Michael Archer and David Wainwright. Kane - a single player gallery shooter by Mike Woodbridge. Vegas Jackpot - a single player fruit machine simulation. Way of the Exploding Fist - a fighting game for 1 or 2 players by Michael Simpson. Note: In-game Galactic Patrol was known as Galaxy Patrol, and Vegas Jackpot as Vegas Casino.
